Articles.Content:
Hello,

I'm just wondering how to ressurrect astronauts in the persistant.sfs in .24?

I googled the question and it says I have to change state from 3 to 0, but it seems my .sfs uses "available", "assigned", and "missing" as opposed to the 3's and 0's. Intuitively I tried changing the "missing" states to "available" and then reloading the game, but it doesn't seem to work.

*also I was wondering if it is safe to change names in the .sfs file? e.g. Jebediah to (Commander)Jebediah?

Thanks,

Edited August 17, 2014 by Likasombodee
You can safely change the name, as for your other question, you also have to change the idx to something other than -1. I believe 0 puts him back in the roster.
